categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle took place in the miasmic canyons of the planet Xagobah in 3 ABY between the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry and the Galactic Empire three weeks into Operation Ringbreaker during the Galactic Civil War. The battle resulted in a victory for the Rebel Alliance.
The battle of Xagobah was first mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
